sen.j: 松平 信豪（まつだいら のぶひで）は、丹波亀山藩の第6代藩主。
sen.e: Nobuhide MATSUDAIRA was the sixth lord of Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
Nobuhide MATSUDAIRA was the sixth lord of the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
Nobuhide MATSUDAIRA was the sixth lord of the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 丹波亀山藩形原松平家11代。
sen.e: The eleventh family head of the House of Katahara-Matsudaira in Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
The eleventh family head of the Katahara-Matsudaira family in the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.
sen.cmt: the House of Katahara-Matsudaira→the Katahara-Matsudaira familyに修正、the Kameyama Domainとしました。
sen.e: The eleventh family head of the Katahara-Matsudaira family in the Kameyama Domain, Tanba Province.

sen.j: 井伊直弼の舅に当たる。
sen.e: A nephew of Naosuke II.
A nephew of Naosuke II.
A nephew of Naosuke II.

sen.j: 文化10年（1813年）2月25日（異説として文化11年（1814年））、第5代藩主・松平信志の七男として生まれる。
sen.e: On March 27, 1813 (heresy 1814), born as the seventh son of Nobuyuki MATSUDAIRA, the fifth lord.
sen.cmt: 「信志」の読みは用語集 “Nobuzane” ではなくエクセル中の “Nobuyuki” を記載しています。
sen.e: On March 27, 1813 (heresy 1814), Nobuhide was born as the seventh son of Nobuyuki MATSUDAIRA, the fifth lord.
On March 27, 1813 (heresy 1814), Nobuhide was born as the seventh son of Nobuyuki MATSUDAIRA, the fifth lord.

sen.j: 文化13年（1816年）、父の死去により家督を継いで第6代藩主となる。
sen.e: In 1816, he succeeded to the position of family head at the time of his father's death to become the sixth lord.
In 1816, he succeeded to the position of family head at the time of his father's death to become the sixth lord.
sen.cmt: 全角アポストロフィーを半角に修正
sen.e: In 1816, he succeeded to the position of family head at the time of his father's death to become the sixth lord.

sen.j: 文政10年（1827年）12月、従五位下・紀伊守に叙任される。
sen.e: In January or February of 1828, conferred to Jugoinoge Kii no Kami (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade, Governor of Kii Province).
In January 1828, conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), the Governor of Kii Province.
sen.cmt: January or February of 1828→January 1828に修正、「従五位下・紀伊守」の表記を修正、余分なスペース消去
sen.e: In January 1828, conferred to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), the Governor of Kii Province.

sen.j: 藩政では家臣や領民の教育化、藩校の拡張などに努めた。
sen.e: He endeavored to educate his vassals and people of his domain, expand a Hanko (a domain school), etc. as his domain duties.
He endeavored to educate his vassals and people of his domain, expand a Hanko (a domain school), etc. as his domain duties.
He endeavored to educate his vassals and people of his domain, expand a Hanko (a domain school), etc. as his domain duties.

sen.j: 天保14年（1843年）2月9日、養子の松平信義に家督を譲って隠居する。
sen.e: On March 9, 1843, he transferred the head of the family to his adopted son Nobuyoshi MATSUDAIRA to retire.
On March 9, 1843, he transferred the head of the family to his adopted son Nobuyoshi MATSUDAIRA to retire.
On March 9, 1843, he transferred the head of the family to his adopted son Nobuyoshi MATSUDAIRA to retire.

sen.j: 慶応元年（1865年）10月19日（異説として10月27日）に死去。
sen.e: Died on December 6 (heresy December 14), 1865.
Died on December 6 (heresy December 14), 1865.
Died on December 6 (heresy December 14), 1865.
Died at the age of 53.
Died at the age of 53.
Died at the age of 53.
